root.name: Disney Sing It: Pop Hits
root.description: Tracklist Colbie Caillat "Realize" "Bubbly" Coldplay "Violet Hill" Miley Cyrus "7 Things""Fly on the Wall""The Climb""Hoedown Throwdown" Duffy 'Warwick Avenue" "Mercy" Vanessa Hudgens "Sneakernight" Jonas Brothers "Hold On" "SOS" "When You Look Me In The Eyes" "Love Bug" "Burnin' Up" Demi Lovato "Get Back""La La Land""Don't Forget" Love Theft "Don't Wake Me" Jem "It's Amazing" Jesse McCartney "It's Over""How Do You Sleep?" Hannah Montana "Let's Get Crazy" "Let's Do This" Mitchel Musso and Tiffany Thornton / "Hatching Pete" (Disney Channel Original Movie) "Let It Go" Mitchel Musso "The In Crowd" One Republic "Apologize" Steve Rushton "Emergency" Taylor Swift"I'm Only Me When I'm With You""Change"
